prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Synth Lead, Piano, Guitar, Drums, Bass, but without Organ.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Drums, Bass, Guitar, Piano, and a Synth Lead, but no Organ.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Piano, Guitar, Synth Lead, Drums, and Bass, but no Organ.

Style 3:
No Organ is included in this song, but it does have Bass, Drums, Guitar, Piano, and a Synth Lead.
